alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 23 at 1:40PM CST until November 26 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER CONDITIONS HEADED TO PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL NEBRASKA AS EARLY AS FRIDAY AFTERNOON AND EXPANDING INTO NORTH CENTRAL KANSAS SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches possible...with locally higher amounts not out of the question. * WHERE...A portion of north central Kansas. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall amounts still remain in question with this approaching system, and even a slight shift to the south over next 24 hours will significantly impact snowfall totals.
info.instruction: Persons should consider delaying all travel. If travel is absolutely necessary Saturday, drive with extreme caution. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
